short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will provide a joke when you are feeling down :-)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Working or studying while staying motivated or trying not to get frustrated can be a challenge. Long periods of time doing tedious work can really drain your mental state. But what if I told you there was a quick and easy way to keep you going and stay positive? Jokes! Jokes are enjoyed universally and can give you a quick boost of dopamine. They can help you enjoy the moment and forget all that negative energy. Jokes are scientifically proven to help us take our minds off things and cope. Thatâ€™s why we developed Joqe! Joqe is a chrome-extension that generates jokes for the user with the press of a button! Our chrome extension also caters to a wide audience by having various joke genres, making it enjoyable to all! Joqe will be able to provide you temporary relief and improve your state of mind, but also in a way that will not cause you to be distracted from your tasks. For example, trying to go on your phone for a short while as a break might seem good, however, you can get easily addicted and fall off track. However, Joqe can provide that brief break from work without the unnecessary distraction. Joqe uses a API that generates a random joke, or in the case that you want a certain joke category, you can select a genre of humour or even search for specific words you want jokes about!
